opennlp.ccg.test
Interface ScorerMaker

All Known Implementing Classes:
CrossValidateRealizer, SRILM_FactoredScorerMaker, SRILM_ScorerMaker
public interface ScorerMaker

Interface for making custom scorers for use in cross-validation tests with the realizer.

Version:
$Revision: 1.6 $, $Date: 2007/12/21 05:13:37 $
Author:
Michael White

Method Summary
 SignScorer loadScorer(File tmpDir, int foldNum, File trainFile)
          Loads a scoring model created from the training data.

          Prepares a scoring model from the training data.
 void prepScorersSummary(File tmpDir)
          Optionally summarizes perplexity or other measures after all calls to prepScorer.
 void setCVR(CrossValidateRealizer cvr)
          Sets the context for this scorer maker.
 

Method Detail

setCVR

void setCVR(CrossValidateRealizer cvr)
Sets the context for this scorer maker.

prepScorer

void prepScorer(File tmpDir,
                int foldNum,
                File trainFile,
                File testFile)
                throws IOException
Prepares a scoring model from the training data. The data can be accessed by creating a RegressionInfo object from the given training file. The test data is also made available to optionally compute perplexity or other measures. The model can be stored in a file in tmpDir, keyed off of foldNum.

Throws:
IOException

prepScorersSummary

void prepScorersSummary(File tmpDir)
                        throws IOException
Optionally summarizes perplexity or other measures after all calls to prepScorer.

Throws:
IOException

loadScorer

SignScorer loadScorer(File tmpDir,
                      int foldNum,
                      File trainFile)
                      throws IOException
Loads a scoring model created from the training data.

Throws:
IOException
